titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3345) to amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate certain restrictions on employee training; to provide temporary authority to agencies relating to voluntary separation incentive payments; and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-436, by Mr. Moakley.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 3345.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 141.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 253 - 170 (Roll no. 87).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/16/1994--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 3345 (Federal Workforce Restructuring Act of 1993).
